Title: Upgrade Image Codec to WebP
Description: Currently serving standard JPGs. Implement logic to convert images to WebP on upload (or via Next.js Image Optimization) to reduce payload size by ~40%.

Title: Implement JSON-LD Schema for Movies
Description: The current site uses deprecated Microdata. Implement dynamic JSON-LD injection for `Movie` and `TVSeries` schemas, including AggregateRating, Director, and Cast fields to capture Google Rich Snippets.

Title: Fix Image Filename SEO
Description: Current images use random TMDB hash filenames (e.g., `fRNg3...jpg`). Update the import pipeline to rename files to `{movie-slug}-poster.jpg` for Image SEO.

Title: Server-Side TMDB Fetcher
Description: Move TMDB fetching from client-side (jQuery) to server-side (Next.js API/Convex Action) to hide API usage and enable proper image processing before saving.

Title: Configure Cloudflare Page Rules
Description: Refine Cloudflare rules: 1. Bypass Cache for `/wp-admin*` and `/wp-login.php*`. 2. Cache Everything for content pages. 3. Enable Edge Cache TTL.

Title: Implement Push Notifications
Description: Re-implement the Push Notification system (Firebase) from the old site into the new Ciyaar app, ensuring explicit opt-in UX.

Title: Install Redis Object Cache
Description: The site database is heavy. Install Redis on the server (`sudo apt install redis`) and use the `Redis Object Cache` plugin to reduce database queries by 90%.
